definitions.example: He took no notice of the changes, and went on as though nothing had happened.
I always read the death notices in the paper.
The sidewalk adjacent to the damaged bridge stonework shall be closed until further notice.

definitions.definition: Advance notification of termination of employment, given by an employer to an employee or vice versa.
definitions.example: I can't work here any longer. I'm giving notice.

definitions.definition: A published critical review of a play or the like.

definitions.example: I don't mind if you want to change the venue; just give me some notice first, OK?

definitions.definition: To become aware of; to observe.
definitions.example: Did you notice the flowers in her yard?

definitions.definition: To lavish attention upon; to treat (someone) favourably.
